page.title: 06Church Farm and Vantage Farm
page.content: Church Farm is situated opposite the church.It is a dairy farm with one hundred and seventy five cows which are milked twice a day.The farm has sixty five calves.There is a horse which is used for riding.There are two dogs.One is black and white,the other is a golden Labrador.There are six cats.There are six hens which lay eggs.There are about twenty fields to the farm.In the fields they grow grass for the cows,hay,barley,oats and wheat.In the summer they make silage for the cows to eat in the winter time.Five men work there. Vantage Farm is owned by members of the same family as Church Farm.At this farm they grow three kinds of crops. They are potatoes,peas and carrots. They keep fifty or sixty bullocks.They have about 10 fields.Vantage Farm was built in the 1700s.
